tag_list: keith-kelly, secret-service-media, new-media, music-marketing, 88-1, college-radio, blue-note
overview:
Keith Kelly is the Founder of Secret Service Media, a New York based Digital Marketing and Design Agency. The firm oversees the Online Marketing for numerous musicians, films, authors, Film and TV personalities.

Prior to founding Secret Service Media, he served as the Director of Artist Relations at YouCast Corporation where he oversaw a team working with musicians and technology companies.

Keith was also the Music Director at the historic college radio stations, 88.1FM KCOU in Columbia, Missouri. He also worked the at The Blue Note and University of Missouri’s College Music Committee helping book and promote events.
